|cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = eMMC/NAND |fla1_num = |fla1chip = |flash1size = 2 GiB |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;; |sw1chip = MediaTek;MT7530WU; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SD Card slot, |exp_minipcie_num = 3 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, UART1,, |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, |specialfeat = |flags = HDMI, MIPI, |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 02/06/2016 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT6625L; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WS2977" and "MT7683 RFB_V1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the photos. ===Features=== *Multimedia Network Router System *Quad-core ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz, big DRAM bandwidth *Interfaces included HDMI, MIPI, PCIe 2.0, USB 2.0, USB 3.0 *MT6625L provided 11bgn WLAN and Bluetooth, PCIe can be added :on 11ac and more WLAN connections to do like concurrent linking ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2016/02/08/98-geek-force-MediaTek-mt7623-router-board-features-6-gbe-ports-and-3-Mini PCIe-slots-for-wifi-3g-and-lte-connectivity/ ''$98 Geek Force MediaTek MT7623 Router Board Features 6 GbE Ports,
3 Mini PCIe Slots for WiFi, 3G, or LTE (Crowdfunding)'' on '''CNX-Software'''] :*SoC: [[MediaTek]] [https://www.MediaTek.com/products/homeNetworking/mt7623n-a MT7623N/A] @1.3GHz (quad-core ARM Cortex-A7) ::with Mali-450MP GPU (MT7623N only) :*System Memory: 2GB (DDR3), Storage: 2Gb (eMMC or NAND Flash), ::SD card slot up to 128 GB, and maybe SATA via the Mini PCIe slots :*WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT6625L 802.11bgn Wi-Fi & BT 4.0 with IPEX ::for Wi-Fi and BT, optional 802.11ac Wi-Fi, 3G/4G via Mini PCIe slots :*Connectivity: 6x GbE ports (WAN / LAN behavior defined by firmware) :*USB: 1x USB 3.0 port, 1x USB 2.0 Host port, 1x micro USB OTG port :*Expansion: 3x Mini PCIe, 26-pin “Raspberry Pi”, 10-pin PCM/SPIO, ::6-pin Apple Auth CP (I2C) connector, 10-pin I2C/I2S, Power header ::*Video: 2x HDMI (one in, one out), 1x RCA video output, MIPI DSI ::*Audio: HDMI port, and optical S/PDIF input and output ports :*Debugging: 20-pin JTAG, 4-pin UART1 connector for serial console :*Misc: IR receiver, power switch, 1x user switch :*Power: 12V [[Category:English Documentation]]
